book.name: Isaiah / Yesha'yahu
book.title: The Book of the Prophet Isaiah / Yesha'yahu [Salvation of Yah]

content: In that day, this song will be sung in the land of Judah [Praised]:

content.text: “We have a strong city.
God appoints yishu'ah ·salvation· for walls and bulwarks.
Open the gates, that the upright nation may enter:
the one which keeps faith.
You will keep whoever’s mind is steadfast in perfect peace,
because he trusts in you.
Trust in Adonai forever;
for in Yah, Adonai , is an everlasting Rock.
For he has brought down those who dwell on high, the lofty city.
He lays it low.
He lays it low even to the ground.
He brings it even to the dust.
The foot shall tread it down;
Even the feet of the poor,
and the steps of the needy.”
The way of the just is uprightness.
You who are upright make the path of the upright level.
Yes, in the way of your judgments, Adonai , have we waited for you. Your name and your renown are the desire of our soul.
With my soul have I desired you in the night. Yes, with my spirit within me will I seek you earnestly; for when your judgments are in the earth, the inhabitants of the world learn righteousness.
Let favor be shown to the wicked, yet he will not learn righteousness. In the land of uprightness he will deal wrongfully, and will not see Adonai ’s majesty.
Adonai , your hand is lifted up, yet they don’t see; but they will see your zeal for the people, and be disappointed. Yes, fire will consume your adversaries.
Adonai , you will ordain peace for us, for you have also done all our work for us.
Yahweh Eloheikhem [Yahweh our God], other lords besides you have had dominion over us, but by you only will we make mention of your name.
The dead shall not live. The departed spirits shall not rise. Therefore you have visited and destroyed them, and caused all memory of them to perish.
You have increased the nation, O Adonai . You have increased the nation! You are glorified! You have enlarged all the borders of the land.
Adonai , in trouble they have visited you. They poured out a prayer when your chastening was on them.
Like as a woman with child, who draws near the time of her delivery, is in pain and cries out in her pangs; so we have been before you, Adonai .
We have been with child. We have been in pain. We gave birth, it seems, only to wind. We have not worked any yishu'ah ·deliverance· in the earth; neither have the inhabitants of the world fallen.
Your dead shall live.
My dead bodies shall arise. Awake and sing, you who dwell in the dust;
for your dew is like the dew of herbs, and
the earth will cast out the departed spirits.

content: Come, my people, enter into your rooms, and shut your doors behind you. Hide yourself for a little moment, until the indignation is past.
For, behold, Adonai comes out of his place to punish the inhabitants of the earth for their iniquity. The earth also will disclose her blood, and will no longer cover her slain.

footnotes.text: MP: The dead in Messiah will bodily resurrect at the same time Messiah is resurrected from the dead. (Fulfillment is shown in three different contexts. Matt 27:52-53; John 11:25; 1 Thes 4:16-17)
